items.sentence: Tom spends hours in his room drawing pictures.
Tom bought a Christmas tree for Mary's family.
Tom reminded me that he had a meeting at 2:30.
If my kids were younger, I'd buy one for them.
The person they were talking about wasn't Tom.
That isn't a snake. It's just a piece of rope.
Many people go to the beach during the summer.
Tom was in the military, but now he's retired.
Not everybody who drinks becomes an alcoholic.
Tom is serving drinks to the guests right now.
Tom can't very well turn his back on Mary now.
What I want is for you to answer my questions.
How old were you when your father passed away?
My dog is sleeping under the bench over there.
I really have no idea what I'm supposed to do.
It's six of one and half-a-dozen of the other.
Only those who dare to dream change the world.
Tom doesn't seem to know much about Australia.
I hope that next time's better than last time.
What's the best way to get to Tom's from here?
I'm getting pretty tired of Tom's complaining.
There must be someone somewhere who likes Tom.
I have no musical talent and neither does Tom.
I don't like the same kind of TV shows as Tom.
I didn't come here to see you, but to see Tom.
The bad harvest caused massive food shortages.
Tom isn't coming, because I don't want him to.
It was obvious to everyone that Tom was tired.
I think Tom's suggestion is worth considering.
It seems that Tom doesn't know how to do that.
This is something that I'm going to do myself.
I've been waiting for days for this to happen.
I think I'm the only one here who can do that.
Does anyone have a pocketknife I could borrow?
Tom isn't from the South. He's from the North.
I want to know when you'll be going to Boston.
I'm sure that Tom will pass the upcoming exam.
Tom plays the viola, and Mary plays the cello.
The situation hasn't changed in the slightest.
I'll see to it that you meet Tom at the party.
I'll never forget visiting Boston last summer.
I tried my best to get Tom to stop doing that.
People were lined up to ride the Ferris wheel.
Tom was kind enough to show me how to do that.
It took us longer to do that than we expected.
Would you be able to come here again tomorrow?
By the time I got there, Tom had already left.
Have you already talked to someone about this?
Tom didn't seem to want to tell me about that.
That's what I learned when I was in Australia.
